attributes.review:
I am an avid Trump Supporter ... I was excited about this app ...  but when I  saw the low review score it gave me pause.  I am sooooo glad I actually read the reviews!!!  Something was obviously screwy with the reviews so after reading several bother people and con, I decided to download the app and check it out for myself.  And I am so happy I did ... I love it!!!  The 1 Star reviews are so obviously waaaaaaaay off base that the only logical conclusion is that it is a concerted effort by people totally against President Trump posing as supporters trying to steer people away from a potentially powerful tool for the Trump 2020 campaign!!!   There is a ton of good as well as interesting information in this app. As well as opportunities to get involved with the campaign even if it is just from your home. Also there are social get-togethers with other Trump supporters listed.  Thank you to the people who took the time to write a legitimate review for this app, it really helped me.  I never write reviews for apps but I am doing so now to try to pay it forward and help someone else get to the truth about this app, like someone helped me.üòÅ
Blessing  so all and if you decide to download this app and like it,  please leave a review and share this app with all your conservative friends so we can drown out these 1 Star review ‚Äòposers‚Äô with honest reviews.  Blessings to you all and let‚Äôs work hard to ‚ÄúKeep America Great‚Äù 
Belinda
attributes.title: I have to agree ... the 1 Star reviews are totally bogus!!!
